materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a valley taken in between Banikhet, Dalhousie in Punjab. The photograph shows a clearing with a small village in the middle of the valley, There are several roofed houses, with some plots of land in the foreground. There are a few hilltops in the background of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Valley between Banikhet and Dalhousie in Punjab
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Dalhousie (India) Punjab (India) Valleys
